### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.reddit.com/r/popular/?geo_filter=GLOBAL](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reddit.com%2Fr%2Fpopular%2F%3Fgeo_filter%3DGLOBAL) ### Comment Username: @petrovadrian > On my iPad (with iPadOS 17) Adguard stopped blocking some ads. Please note that I already had iOS 17 + Adguard before, and ads were being blocked. This problem started approximately 2 days prior to creating this ticket. > > It no longer blocks Reddit "Promoted" ads: https://i.imgur.com/dTF5tC3.png > > And it fails some adblocker tests: https://i.imgur.com/yFDboYh.png & https://i.imgur.com/yvPnYIf.png > > I reinstall the app several times and cleared Safari cookies. I tried different filter configurations (default included) and nothing changed. > > Issue doesn't occur on iPhone (iOS 16) with default (Adguard) settings: https://i.imgur.com/oAPRjuF.png > > ### Screenshots
